title: Disturbia
author: Rihanna
lyrics:
[00:01.72] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (what's wrong with me?)
[00:05.72] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (why do I feel like this?)
[00:09.57] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (I'm going crazy now)
[00:13.76] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[00:17.55] No more gas, in the red (can't even get it started)
[00:21.46] Nothing heard, nothing said (can't even speak about it)
[00:25.21] All my life on my head (don't want to think about it)
[00:29.16] Feels like I'm going insane, yeah
[00:32.98] It's a thief in the night to come and grab you (ah-ah)
[00:37.06] It can creep up inside you and consume you (ah-ah)
[00:40.55] A disease of the mind, it can control you (ah-ah)
[00:44.33] It's too close for comfort, oh
[00:47.34] Put on your brake lights
[00:49.30] You're in the city of wonder
[00:51.48] Ain't gon' play nice
[00:53.14] Watch out, you might just go under
[00:55.39] Better think twice
[00:57.03] Your train of thought will be altered
[00:59.28] So if you must falter, be wise
[01:02.21] Your mind's in disturbia
[01:04.86] It's like the darkness is the light
[01:07.15] Disturbia, am I scaring you tonight? (Your mind is in)
[01:11.06] Disturbia, ain't used to what you like
[01:14.83] Disturbia, disturbia
[01:18.75] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[01:22.63] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[01:26.42] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[01:30.24] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[01:34.20] Faded pictures on the wall (it's like they talkin' to me)
[01:38.20] Disconnected, no one calls (the phone don't even ring)
[01:42.11] I gotta get out or figure this shit out
[01:45.62] It's too close for comfort, oh
[01:49.73] It's a thief in the night to come and grab you (ooh)
[01:53.89] It can creep up inside you and consume you (ooh)
[01:57.48] A disease of the mind, it can control you (ooh)
[02:01.27] I feel like a monster, oh
[02:04.25] Put on your brake lights
[02:06.10] You're in the city of wonder (city lights)
[02:08.23] Ain't gon' play nice
[02:10.04] Watch out, you might just go under
[02:12.16] Better think twice (think twice)
[02:14.00] Your train of thought will be altered
[02:16.08] So if you must falter, be wise (be wise)
[02:19.10] Your mind is in disturbia
[02:21.69] It's like the darkness is the light
[02:24.06] Disturbia, am I scaring you tonight? (Oh)
[02:27.74] Disturbia, ain't used to what you like (what you like)
[02:31.69] Disturbia, disturbia
[02:35.50] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[02:39.33] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum
[02:43.11] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (disturbia)
[02:47.36] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (oh-oh)
[02:51.19] Release me from this curse I'm in
[02:55.17] Trying to maintain, but I'm struggling
[02:59.59] If you can't go, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[03:02.84] I think I'm gonna ah-ah-ah-ah-ah
[03:05.70] Put on your brake lights
[03:07.51] You're in the city of wonder (woo, yeah)
[03:09.59] Ain't gon' play nice
[03:11.31] Watch out, you might just go under
[03:13.42] Better think twice (better think twice)
[03:15.10] Your train of thought will be altered
[03:17.43] So if you must falter, be wise (if you must falter, be wise)
[03:20.75] Your mind is in disturbia
[03:22.90] It's like the darkness is the light (ah, yeah)
[03:25.32] Disturbia, am I scaring you tonight? (Ah, yeah)
[03:29.32] Disturbia, ain't used to what you like (disturbia, ah)
[03:32.95] Disturbia, disturbia
[03:37.02] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (bum-ba-de-da-da)
[03:40.76] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (bum-ba-de-da-da)
[03:44.70] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (oh)
[03:48.59] Bum bum be-dum, bum bum be-dum bum (oh)
[03:53.45]
